name: Draw For Ball: Red Ball Adventure
name_original: Draw For Ball: Red Ball Adventure
description:
Touch the screen and drag to draw lines and help the red ball complete the challenge! 

This is a game where everyone can have fun! Some levels may seem easy, but make no mistake, these levels are harder than they look, let's see if you can beat them all. 

Game Features: 

1. Simple and addictive mechanics. 

2. Offline, play anywhere, anytime. 

3. Free to play. 

4. Unlimited lives. 

5. Variety of balls for you to use. 

6. Simple, fun and casual. 

7. Draw lines freely to complete the levels. 

8. Interesting physics game. 

9. Incredible and exciting challenges. 

10. Beautiful colorful graphics. 

11. Compatible with all screen sizes. 

Try to find your best strategy to pass the level in this physics-based platform game, the level of difficulty of the challenges will gradually increase. 

To pass the level you need to survive by dodging obstacles, enemies, and crossing the finish line. 

Beware of the thorns, they are scattered everywhere, at the top, bottom and sides. 

Do not fall into the hole, if you fall you will be dead, but do not worry because the lives are unlimited, so you are free to play again, as many times as you want. 

Don't be angry if you catch the ball between the lines, if the ball gets stuck, touch the reset button. 

In the next updates, new types of balls will be added eg: Soccer Ball Basketball Ball Golf Ball Bowling Ball Candy Ball Billiard Ball 

For those who love and like Arcade, Platform, Action, Casual, Physics, Drawing games , Single player, Indie and offline, I recommend definitely try the Draw For Ball game. 

Join us and play the best Draw For Ball game ever!
